pma:database.name: portal
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `admin` ( `admin_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `admin_user` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `admin_password` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `admin_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `admin_dept` varchar(3) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`admin_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `assignments` ( `as_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `as_file_name` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `as_file_size` int(11) NOT NULL, `as_file_type` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `as_file_content` longblob NOT NULL, `as_num` int(11) NOT NULL, `as_stu_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `as_grp_code` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `as_date_upload` date NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`as_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=7 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `course` ( `course_dept_code` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `course_code` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `course_name` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `course_active` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`course_code`), UNIQUE KEY `course_code` (`course_code`), KEY `course_name_2` (`course_name`), KEY `course_name` (`course_name`), KEY `course_name_3` (`course_name`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `department` ( `dept_code` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `dept_name` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `dept_active` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`dept_code`), UNIQUE KEY `dept_name` (`dept_name`), UNIQUE KEY `dept_code` (`dept_code`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `dept_sem_course` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `dsc_course_code` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `dsc_stu_dept_code` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `dsc_fac_dept_code` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `dsc_sem_code` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `dsc_active` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=14 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `faculty_login` ( `fac_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `fac_name` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `fac_username` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `fac_password` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `fac_dept_code` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `fac_position` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `fac_circular_event_access` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `fac_active` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`fac_id`), UNIQUE KEY `fac_username` (`fac_username`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=9 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `file` ( `file_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `file_fac_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `file_course_code` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `file_sem_code` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `file_name` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `file_size` int(11) NOT NULL, `file_type` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `file_content` longblob NOT NULL, `file_category` tinyint(4) NOT NULL, `file_date_upload` date NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`file_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=48 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `group_files` ( `gf_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `gf_file_name` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `gf_file_size` int(11) NOT NULL, `gf_file_type` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `gf_file_content` longblob NOT NULL, `gf_category` tinyint(4) NOT NULL, `gf_description` text NOT NULL, `gf_fac_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `gf_grp_code` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `gf_date_upload` date NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`gf_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=22 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `semester` ( `sem_code` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `sem_name` varchar(100) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`sem_code`), UNIQUE KEY `sem_code` (`sem_code`), UNIQUE KEY `sem_name` (`sem_name`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `semester_section` ( `ss_code` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `ss_dept_code` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `ss_sem_code` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `ss_section` varchar(20) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ss_code`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `student_groups` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `sg_usn` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `sg_grp_code` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `sg_head` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `student_login` ( `stu_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `stu_name` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `stu_usn` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `stu_password` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `stu_dept_code` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `stu_sem_code` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `stu_section` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `stu_active` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`stu_id`), UNIQUE KEY `stu_username` (`stu_usn`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=15 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
